line: It's been a while since we last had a Newsletter. Though, there is no need to emphasise the importance of communication via a newsletter, its structure and function, should change keeping in tune with the changed times. It is more so, especially, in this mobile digital age. While the structure, perforce, should assume a much more handy one (I don't mind if you replace 'handy' with 'mobile' ;-)), the function should cater to the requirements of both harbinger and acolyte, veteran and young, master and pupil alike.

Keeping this dual dogma in mind, we are starting it afresh. You can read it in desktop and mobile without much fuss. And, we would like to provide as much trendy information as the chapter activities/forthcoming events, etc. It should be knowledge-enhancing, besides providing useful information related to our chapter.
We would like to provide one good technical article every issue. (To start, 'Java 8 vs Java 9' is chosen as the first one in this series.)
I feel honored to be bestowed with this responsibility of bringing out this newsletter. I'd like to thank, profusely, the hony. Chairman and Secretary for this job.
I, hereby, request all of you to contribute for the upkeep and enhancement of this newsletter in future!
